Name: Trilby No.1
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Nick & Nora glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Whisky and sweet vermouth are a commonplace and harmonious pairing, here with floral notes from parfait amour, aromatised and toned by absinthe and orange bitters.
History: The first known recipe for a Trilby cocktail appears in Harry Johnson's 1900 Bartender's Manual .
Nutrition: One serving of Trilby No.1 contains 147 calories
